Text:
Finns det möjligen 64-bitars versionen också ? Det skulle vara toppen om du kunde lägga upp den ! Tack på förhand.

Is there a 64-bits version too ? It would be great if you could seed it ! Thanks in advance.

Wait a minute:

This version (Datacenter) is for VERY LARGE SYSTEMS. If you don't have a server with at least 8 processors (minimum req. to install it) & 1GB of RAM (512 min.), and a need to manage 1000+ computers, don't use it, go for something slightly less heavy... 

In a corporation of that size, you would have the money to buy it anyhow....

Just for your information :)

load_error
Ja, att installera den här är otvivelaktigt overkill. =)
